derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin rubricat- 'marked in red', from the verb rubricare, from rubrica (see rubric)

means.word_mean: 1. place in the calendar as a red-letter saint;
2. furnish with rubrics or regulate by rubrics;

sentences.sentence: "In this beautiful book, all the place names are rubricated"

means.word_mean: 4. sign with a mark instead of a name

stems_affixes.word_buile: rubi=rub红+cund表形容词→adj.[脸色]红润的
